channel.title: Barrage Multi-Hit

item.title: Barrage Multi-Hit
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

There are loads of errors with that code.

People can probably still attack with multi barrage even if they are in 1v1, a level 126 could attack a level 3, etc.

Try this;

if (spell == 12891 && multiCombat() && combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel && isInWilderness()) { attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 2); } else if (!multiCombat()) { return 30000; }

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage Multi-Hit
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

	if (spell == 12891) {
		attackPlayersWithin(369, 67, 30);
		return 40000;
	}

That’s the code I have right now, but it like hits 80’s on people and it attacks people even when they are in safe zone, it attacks yourself even, please show me what is wrong with that code.

Read full topic
